bibl.title: The Cosmogonic Moment in the Derveni Papyrus.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. Ontology before cosmogony. - 3. The mythic backdrop. - 4. The pre-cosmic phases. - 5. The cosmogonic moment. - 6. Simultaneous events. - 7. Proposals for an eschatology.

bibl.title: "Presocratics and Plato: Festschrift at Delphi in Honor of Charles Kahn. Papers Presented at the Festschrift Symposium in Honor of Charles Kahn Organized by the HYELE Institute for Comparative Studies, European Cultural Center of Delphi, June 3rd-7th, 2009, Delphi, Greece."

bibl.seg: Richard McKirahan, The Cosmogonic Moment in the Derveni Papyrus.

Richard Patterson, Vassilis Karasmanis & Arnold Hermann (edd.), Presocratics and Plato: Festschrift at Delphi in Honor of Charles Kahn. Papers Presented at the Festschrift Symposium in Honor of Charles Kahn Organized by the HYELE Institute for Comparative Studies, European Cultural Center of Delphi, June 3rd-7th, 2009, Delphi, Greece (Las Vegas - Zurich - Athens, 2012) pp. 79-110.
